availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Howard Bogy (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Margaret J. Teeter Bogy in Garrard County on August 27, 1859. Farmer in Garrard County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Garrard County, KY, June, July, & August 1863, p. 16, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "James Howard Bogie (December 11, 1838-August 25, 1888)," Memorial #85228921, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85228921 (accessed May 16, 2018).
